front.title: Local Processing Model for version 3 of the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMPv3)

abstract.t: This document describes the Local Processing Model (LPM) for SNMP version 3 for use in the SNMPng architecture [SNMPng-ARCH]. This document defines the Elements of Procedure for accessing local management information. This document also includes a MIB for remotely monitoring/managing the configuration parameters for this LPM.
